duties_responsibilities.duty: Implements, evaluates & maintains automated office systems that enhance the efficiency & effectiveness of the department.
Provides secretarial support for the department including data preparation, compilation & input.
Supports the administrative operations of the department and collaborates with payroll to maintain accurate departmental biweekly payroll.
Assists Nurse Managers to provide secretarial duties and answers telephone calls, screening and directing them appropriately.
Orders & maintains supplies necessary for efficient functioning of the department and organizes & records meeting minutes, handouts & assumes responsibility for distribution.
Participates in performance improvement activities and collects data for evaluation.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma (Business school or related job experience preferred)
